ValidationRule.description: Calculation must be in 'Delivered' status in order for the Parent Case it's tied to to be closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Delivered")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status__c) , "Delivered")) && ISPICKVAL( Case__r.Status , "Resolved")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case cannot be resolved until the Calculation Object is set to 'Delivered' by Compliance
